biotools.summary:
Reconstructing tumor evolutionary histories and clone trees in polynomial-time with SubMARine.

SubMARine is a polynomial-time algorithm that reconstructs cancer evolutionary histories by building partial clone trees.

bioschemas.name: SubMARine
